name: 3DPlatformer - Tutorial
description:
Description:

This small 3D Platformer was developed in Unity Game Engine and highlights character controller and animation scripts, in depth look at using Unity extensions, setting up custom particles, and creating a whitebox environment.

Modifications:

  1. Change the player movement script to have different movement in final game
  2. A full and complete Level 3
  3. A full and complete Level 4
  4. A visually and auditory difference from Tutorial Project to Final Project.
